title: French fishing threats disappointing, UK says

content: The ruling is the latest step in an escalating dispute over Poland's legal reforms.

title: Surviving in Kuwait's 'unbearable' heat
content: The Middle East is warming faster than much of the world, leaving Kuwaitis struggling with everyday life.

content: The UK's new £200m research vessel is in London ahead of her first ocean voyage to the Antarctic.

title: Civil rights pioneer wants arrest record cleared
content: Claudette Colvin was just 15 in 1955 when she refused to give up her seat on a bus for a white person.

title: Koeman sacked as Barcelona manager
content: Ronald Koeman is sacked as head coach of Barcelona after 14 months in charge at the Nou Camp following a defeat by Rayo Vallecano.

title: Humans turning forests into carbon sources
content: Human activity and wildfires have turned protected forests into net sources of carbon, a study suggests.

title: World Bank freezes cash to Sudan after coup
content: Pressure mounts on the military to restore civilian rule as international bodies respond.

title: Cavallo on coming out as gay: 'It's my freedom day'
content: Josh Cavallo has come out as gay - the only current top level male professional footballer to do so.
